title: dissembler
extract: dissembler - a person who professes beliefs and opinions that he or she does not hold in order to conceal his or her real feelings or motives. dissimulator, hypocrite, phoney, phony, pretender.
extract_html: dissembler - a person who professes beliefs and opinions that he or she does not hold in order to conceal his or her real feelings or motives. dissimulator, hypocrite, phoney, phony, pretender.
